profile.occupation: Software Development Internship Trainee at Plum
profile.headline: Computer Science Student at the University of Chicago | Aspiring Software Engineer & Entrepreneur
profile.summary: I'm a Computer Science student at the University of Chicago, passionate about combining software development with entrepreneurship.

experiences.title: Software Development Internship Trainee
experiences.description:
- Enhanced AI assistant performance by experimenting with embedding-based matching and LLM integrations (Langchain, OpenAI), identifying LLMs as optimal for rapid categorization.
- Collaborated on the development of an AI assistant for shipping calculation and risk analysis using Python, FastAPI, and Langchain, under the mentorship of a senior Backend Engineer.
- Streamlined team workflow by developing internal software in Budibase, transitioning the team from manual spreadsheet management to a more efficient system.

experiences.title: Affiliate Marketer (Level 5/5)
experiences.description:
- Generated over $150,000 in revenue for an ecommerce website in just 3 months, significantly expanding the platform’s presence in Greece as a top-performing affiliate.
- Acquired over 5.5k users through data-driven marketing and content creation strategies, leveraging insights to drive successful campaigns.
- Rapidly progressed to the top affiliate level within 2 months after being personally invited to the program, demonstrating strong performance and rapid growth.

experiences.title: Software Development Internship Trainee
experiences.description:
- Developed an AI recipe generator using Next.js and OpenAI's API, collaborating closely with the Frontend Team lead to refine web development skills and integrate project features effectively.
- Awarded the internship after winning the 2022 StCatsHacks Hackathon, where I built the original AI recipe generator that utilized users’ leftovers.

education.school: St Catherine's British School, Athens, Greece

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Hackathon Winner of StCatsHacks
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
- Created an LLM and image generation-based AI recipe generator.
- Was awarded a position in efood's summer software development internship program as a result of this win.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Outstanding Pearson Learner Award in Economics
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
- Awarded the Outstanding Pearson Learner Award (2022) for achieving the highest mark in Greece for Pearson Edexcel IGCSE Economics.
- Recognized for academic excellence and exceptional performance in the subject.

accomplishment_projects.title: IntelPol Student Newspaper
accomplishment_projects.description:
- A student-run newspaper focusing on politics, economics, and business, providing insightful articles and analysis.
- Invited by Athanasios Mitropoulos and Vassilis Hadjiemmanuil to join the IntelPol project as Technical Officer/Lead Developer.
- Developed the bulk of the site's features & managed key technical aspects using the Wix Website Builder.
